disparate_impact_ratio: N/A (no protected demographic features present in dataset)
fp_fn_distribution_across_groups: Assumed equal (no demographic groups in dataset).
retraining_frequency_note: Requires training logs; placeholder not calculated.
infrastructure_cost_month_note: NOT_CALCULATED - use prompt below to estimate.
prompt_infra_estimate:
Estimate monthly infrastructure & operational cost for running fraud detection model.
Inputs (please provide realistic values):
- number_transactions_per_month (int)
- average_model_latency_ms and average CPU cores used per inference
- memory per node (GB) and number of nodes
- cost per compute-core-hour (USD)
- cost per GB-hour of RAM (USD)
- storage costs (monthly, USD)
- SRE/ops overhead (monthly, USD)

Return: estimated total monthly cost (USD) and a short breakdown.
prompt_auto_routable:
Estimate % of transactions that could be automatically routed for other business actions.
Inputs:
- monthly transaction volume
- business rules for auto-routing (confidence threshold, acceptable risk)
- typical % of transactions with probability > threshold

Return: estimated percent and recommended thresholds.
prompt_opportunity_cost:
Estimate opportunity cost avoided by predictive insights (monthly).
Inputs:
- monthly number of fraud incidents historically and average loss per incident (USD)
- model detection uplift compared to baseline (e.g., 20% fewer frauds)
- cost to implement other countermeasures

Return: estimated monthly opportunity cost avoided (USD).
prompt_stress_test:
To perform stress tests simulate: (1) 5x fraud spike for 1 hour; (2) 10x overall TPS for 10 minutes.
Measure detection rate and latency; return detection rate (%) and p95 latency under stress.
